description: Hochst group of the 'Disturbed Slumber' modelled by Johann Peter Melchior, as a little boy in a black tricorn and rose coat, watching another in a white cap and jacket and pink breechs, tickle with a feather a little girl in a black apron and yellow skirt while she sleeps by her basket of toys, leaning on a brick wall before a fence, on a grassy and rocky mound base.
title: Disturbed Sleeper
